DOC.brief_summary: The purpose current study examine influence feedback psychotherapeutic competency . The present randomized control study compare feedback condition non-feedback condition . Therapists feedback condition receive feedback every fourth session . The feedback give two trained independent raters . The raters licence experienced psychotherapist . Therapists non-feedback condition receive feedback psychotherapy .
DOC.criteria: Therapists Having successfully complete interim audit Having start treat ambulant patient Remaining least 6 month ambulance Patients Meeting ICD 10 criterion mental disorder Informed consent Currently psychotherapy Suicidal tendency Clinical diagnosis alcohol drug addiction , acute schizophrenia , schizoaffective disorder bipolar disorder Clinical diagnosis personality disorder cluster A ( odd disorder ) B ( dramatic , emotional erratic )
